column5: I don't know much about boats but i think this might be a hard question since propellers can probabaly be made out of different materials, but  i just want a general idea of how much a new propeller for a 9.9HP johnson outboard will cost =] also, can propeller be repaired? how much would it cost to fix a propeller for a 9.9 HP johnson outboard? Thanks
Thay can be repaired, however a new one may not be as expensive as you think.

its been a few years since I bought a prop but I'd think you could get something for $100. Royal Distributing on the 400 near Barrie had props a couple of years ago. Not sure if they still do, or if they are any good, but I remember the cost being very reasonable
For a 9.9 HP prop, it costs about $80~100 max. I got a brand new prop for 50 HP Merc on Ebay, it only costs me $50.
Had one in the classified few months back, still have it if your interested.     I believe it's from a 9.9 Evinrude/Johnson. PM if it's what you want
